CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The decent hole mobilities of both copolymers can be attributed to high crystallinity of the copolymers due to the highly coplanar structure of anthracene and DPP.

Let's think step by step.

1. Copolymers: Materials (specific type of polymers)
2. Anthracene and DPP: Materials (specific chemical compounds)

So, the Material Name entities in the paragraph are "copolymers," "anthracene," and "DPP."
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The decent hole mobilities of both copolymers can be attributed to high crystallinity of the copolymers due to the highly coplanar structure of anthracene and DPP.

Let's think step by step.

1. Decent hole mobilities of both copolymers: This refers to the ability of the copolymers to conduct holes effectively. "Decent" is an adjective modifying "mobilities," which is a physical property that describes how easily charge carriers (in this case, holes) can move through a material. "Both copolymers" is a noun phrase indicating two specific copolymers under discussion.

2. High crystallinity of the copolymers: "High crystallinity" is a property that describes the degree of orderliness in the arrangement of the molecules in the copolymers. It is a quantifiable measure of the solid-state structure of the material.

3. Highly coplanar structure of anthracene and DPP: "Highly coplanar structure" is a property that describes the degree to which the planes of the anthracene and DPP molecules lie flat and parallel to each other. This property can influence the crystallinity and charge transport properties of the copolymers.

Anthracene and DPP are specific chemical compounds mentioned in the paragraph. They are not properties, but they do have properties that are relevant to the discussion.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Decent hole mobilities of the copolymers
2. High crystallinity of the copolymers

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Decent hole mobilities of the copolymers |
| High crystallinity of the copolymers |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The decent hole mobilities of both copolymers can be attributed to high crystallinity of the copolymers due to the highly coplanar structure of anthracene and DPP.

Let's think step by step.

1. Decent hole mobilities of both copolymers: This refers to the ability of the copolymers to conduct holes effectively. It is a physical property related to their electrical conductivity.
2. High crystallinity of the copolymers: This is a structural property, indicating the extent to which the copolymers have a solid, ordered structure.
3. Highly coplanar structure of anthracene and DPP: This is a molecular property, describing the arrangement of the anthracene and DPP molecules in a flat, planar way.

So, the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Decent hole mobilities of both copolymers
2. High crystallinity of the copolymers.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Decent hole mobilities of both copolymers (electrical conductivity)
High crystallinity of the copolymers (structural property).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                                   |
|----------------------------------------------|
| Decent hole mobilities of both copolymers        |
| High crystallinity of the copolymers           |
